name: Bard
description: Invoking magic through music, dance, and verse, Bards are expert at inspiring others, soothing hurts, disheartening foes, and creating illusions.

1.Bardic Inspiration: As a Bonus Action, inspire a creature within 60 feet. They gain a Bardic Inspiration die (d6) to add to a failed D20 Test within 1 hour. Uses equal to Charisma modifier (min 1), regained on Long Rest. Die becomes d8 at level 5, d10 at level 10, d12 at level 15.
1.Spellcasting: Cast spells using Charisma. Know 2 cantrips, prepare 4 level 1+ spells from the Bard spell list. Use a Musical Instrument as a Spellcasting Focus.

2.Expertise: Gain Expertise in two skill proficiencies of your choice.
2.Jack of All Trades: Add half your Proficiency Bonus (round down) to any ability check that doesn't already use your Proficiency Bonus.

4.Ability Score Improvement: Increase one ability score by 2, or increase two ability scores by 1.

5.Font of Inspiration: Regain all expended uses of Bardic Inspiration on Short or Long Rest. Can expend a spell slot to regain one use.

6.Subclass Feature: Gain a feature from your Bard College subclass.

7.Countercharm: When you or a creature within 30 feet fails a save against Charmed or Frightened, use Reaction to reroll with Advantage.

8.Ability Score Improvement: Increase one ability score by 2, or increase two ability scores by 1.

9.Expertise: Gain Expertise in two more skill proficiencies of your choice.

10.Magical Secrets: When gaining prepared spells, can choose from Bard, Cleric, Druid, or Wizard spell lists.

12.Ability Score Improvement: Increase one ability score by 2, or increase two ability scores by 1.

14.Subclass Feature: Gain a feature from your Bard College subclass.

16.Ability Score Improvement: Increase one ability score by 2, or increase two ability scores by 1.

18.Superior Inspiration: When you roll Initiative, regain expended uses of Bardic Inspiration until you have two.

19.Epic Boon: Gain an Epic Boon feat or another feat of your choice.

20.Words of Creation: Always have Power Word: Heal and Power Word: Kill prepared. Can target a second creature within 10 feet when casting either.
